title: My first typeface
content:
It's true that's my first attempt to create a typeface.  
Actually I had to do a logo and these letters evolved during that time.  
It happened some time ago but I thought I should improve them.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140107035632im_/http:/typophile.com/files/friends1_4905.jpg)

I would like to know your opinion about it.  
I have already posted them on [http://typophile.com/node/55517](http://web.archive.org/web/20140107035632/http:/typophile.com/node/55517)

Please critique it.

Thank you.
author: Florinf
